name: Bitfex
description: Crypto exchange Itex.trade has released its own token Bitfenix Crypto Exchange (BCE). The entire income of the exchange will be distributed among the owners of tokens. 100k issued tokens is 100% of the exchange's revenue. There is no commission for bidding, as well as deposits/withdrawals for the BCE token! All exchange earnings received from trading and withdrawals of BTC, LTC and DOGE will be put up for the purchase of the token. The income from trading and withdrawals of all other tokens will be distributed among the token holders as a percentage according to the decision of the main holders. Owners of more than 3% of tokens will be added to a closed investor chat, where the exchange's development strategy will be discussed and a decision will be made on the distribution of dividends among all token owners.
